description: Designed with a soft, curved line that mimics a calm ocean surface, ‘Ilikai is the handsome, full-grain leather sandal you’ve been searching for. Equal parts island character and modern depth, this premium sandal features kapa-inspired chevron artwork and supportive construction. Made for the beach, not the ocean— prolonged contact with water may cause damage.
name: Olukai Ilikai - Mens

specs.value: Their first leather sandal to feature an in-board construction style where the straps dive into the footbed platform. This provides a more secure fit, while allowing for a clean, sharp aesthetic
The anatomical, lightweight EVAfootbed delivers all-day support and cushioning. Kapa-inspired chevron lasered artwork adds character
Featuring their non-marking 'Wet Grip Rubber' outsole with a podded, kapa-inspired pattern for added traction and a debossed leather logo for custom style
